translations: 万有引力，重力；移动，吸引

sentences.sentence: Eleven point two kilometers per second, at which satellites can be freed from the gravitation of the earth, is called "escape speed".
sentences.translation: 卫星以11.2千米每秒的速度前进可以脱离地球引力，这被称为“逃逸速度”。

sentences.sentence: One of them is the force of gravitation (地心引力), which tries to pull the satellite towards the earth and is like a rope which keeps the satellite from flying away.
sentences.translation: 其中一个是地心引力的力量，这股力量试图把卫星拉向地球，就像一根把卫星绑住的绳子，防止卫星飞远了。

sentences.sentence: This is called gravitation, or gravity.
